Name: World Titans War
About the game: WORLD TITANS WAR Tomorrow’s world is infernally boring, society has evolved and a large part of the population can’t satisfy their primary needs, for this reason, Titan Link Corp. offers unique experiences, where people, thanks to the technology, are able to return to the past and Survive in a world set in Europe during Second World War. World Titans War will immerse you in a hostile world, where only your reputation can make your life easier, get ready to survive in a world where no one trusts anyone, try it alone or with your friends. As a civilian you will have to get provisions, build your new home, improve your skills, trade, carry out missions and most importantly, survive. As a soldier you must collaborate with your army, communicate, attack and defend the territory, take advantage of the experience and rewards obtained fighting in the army to make your life in the world of World Titans War more comfortable. Survive to the Second World War using the right tactics and strategies. Collaborate with your army to win the war by advancing across the terrain step by step. Manage resources correctly and crush your enemies!
